---
title: "PHOIBLE: cross-linguistic phonological inventory data"
author: "Stefano Coretta"
---

![](../img/phoible.png)


> [PHOIBLE](https://phoible.org) is a repository of cross-linguistic phonological inventory data, which have been extracted from source documents and tertiary databases and compiled into a single searchable convenience sample..

The data from PHOIBLE are available in R through the [lingtypology](https://docs.ropensci.org/lingtypology/index.html) package.

Use the PHOIBLE data to explore patterns in the phonological inventories, areal features or anything else you like!
